title: Karongi
page_copy: Listen to radio stations from Karongi, from a wide variety of genres like Catholic, Education, Entertainment and Talk.  Enjoy stations such as Radio Maria Rwanda and more.  Come find the top new songs, playlists, and music!  Listen on your iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch, Android, Blackberry, and other app-enabled mobile phones.

title: Kigali
page_copy: Listen to radio stations from Kigali, from a wide variety of genres like African, Entertainment, Music, News and Talk.  Enjoy stations such as Radio Rwanda, Radio Maria Rwanda, Radio TV 10, Radio Flash FM, Radio Isango Star and more.  Come find the top new songs, playlists, and music!  Listen on your iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch, Android, Blackberry, and other app-enabled mobile phones.

radio_info.rest: (ORINFOR), a government information agency.

radio_info.short: Founded in 2004, Radio10 - 87.6 FM is the first & probably the best rwandan private radio station. From KGL to NYC, R10 is the
radio_info.rest: Radio of all Rwandans & friends of Rwanda. With millions of listeners, Radio10 is one of the most listened Radio in Rwanda. At Radio10 they tend to think big and out of the box. They are continuously innovating, they are connected and they aim to be a panafrican radio station. Radio 10 is definitely the new Rwanda voice.
